I believe it would be a great addition to your collection and enhance your experience. Considering its quality and benefits, I am offering it to you for $100. This is a special offer tailored for someone with discerning taste like yourself. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly exceptional. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
